description:

name: Fiesta Latina

description:
We organise an indian dinner with live music, massage, etc.
We need 100 people and expect to reach 2000eur profit for the indian project Bharathi trust: http://vimeo.com/67758155

Bharathi Trust is a non-profit development organisation working for the cause of upliftment and empowerment of Irula Tribal communities living in the interior pockets of Thiruvallur district. Since 1990, it has been working among the Irula communities in more than 60 villages spreading over 5 Taluks of the District. It has been conducting a number of development programmes such as Sangam formation, awareness camps, liason work with government for obtaining development schemes, day care services, motivation centres for eradication of child labour. etc All the details of our project here: http://johnvandenplas.wix.com/quinoa-inde-2014


18th PROGRAMM:

- Doors and baropening at 6.30
- Non-stop buffet from 7 untill 9 PM

Prices : 1drink+samousas+Warm indian meal+live music from[masked]€ (Adult 15€ - Student/Actiris 12€ - Children 10€)
+ Pictures corner
+ Massage corner
+ Tombola

Subscribe before Tuesday:
[masked] + BE[masked]


communication: Name/Firstname + nbr of people + soirée indienne

INFORMATIONS
Stephanie Bosnjak[masked]
